column5: Don't forget to spring your clock forward one hour this Sunday morning at 2am (or before you go to bed Saturday).  It will be nice to see the sun out til 730pm....but come on...let's get those temperatures up!  Also is a great time to change the batteries in your smoke detectors!  Here's a cool pic from last summer....thinking warm thoughts here!!
Looks like we went one week to early Cliff. LOL  I was enjoying the 6:30 am sun rise. Dang,dark going to work again.
Ice fishing til 8pm will be new for me! Lol
Dam..  Now I have to wait an extra hour for the walleye bite..
